attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Even know it is illegal to hunt white tigers people still do it! i want to see People who Hunt to be put in jails for years and years! these are beautiful Creatures that shall not be hunted anymore!By Signing This you will join me as we try and stop hunting of white tigers!

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
